Settings.ProjectConfig.MemberManagement..message: Are you sure you want to remove {name} ({id})?
Their data will remain with the project and the project data on their device will stay on their device, but their device will be unable to sync new data.

components.LeaveProjectModal.checkConfir.message: I understand I will be deleting all data from Project {name} from my device

components.LeaveProjectModal.deleteWarni.message: This will delete {observations} observations and {mediaSize}mb of data from this device.

components.LeaveProjectModal.leaveConfir.message: Are you sure you want to leave project {projectName}

components.LeaveProjectModal.unsyncedWar.message: Sync with a team member so you donâ€™t lose these edits or observations

components.skipMigrationModal.message1.message: You will start Mapeo SuperS with a new empty project.

components.skipMigrationModal.message2.message: If you have synchronized you data to another computer that is performing data migrations, and you want to continue colaborating, you need to receive an invitation from that device to join its project. After joining the project and synchronizing you will be able to see your previous data and add new data using MapeoSuperS.

components.skipMigrationModal.message3.message: If you have not synchronized your data to another computer and you want to continue seeing your data with MapeoSuperS, you will need to go back and migrate your data or use Mapeo 5 to synchronize with the computer designated for migration first.

components.skipMigrationModal.message4.message: You can skip this now and data will not be lost. It will just not be visible in MapeoSuperS. To migrate your data later, find out more

components.skipMigrationModal.skippedMes.message: Join a project or create a project

modals.createProject.deviceNameFieldLabe.message: Add a name for your device

modals.createProject.projectConfigCaptio.message: Optional. You can import a config any time.

modals.createProject.projectNameFieldLab.message: Enter a name for the Project

modals.createProject.question1.message: Can Participants see other team members' observations?

modals.createProject.question2.message: Can Participants edit other team members' observations?

views.Home.Settings.ProjectConfig.Config.message: To create or join a new project you will have to leave your current project. Your data can not be transferred to the new project.

views.Home.Settings.ProjectConfig.Invite.message: Make sure both devices are on the same wifi network
Make sure both devices are using MapeoSuperS
As a Coordinator this device can invite and remove devices from this project, and manage project details.
As a Participant this device can create, edit, sync and share observations. They cannot manage users or project details.
Select a Role for this Device
Waiting for Device to Accept Invite

views.Home.Settings.ProjectConfig.Manage.message: Invite other devices to your project to start syncing and sharing data

views.migration.migrateInfo.message: It should take less than 5 minutes!

views.migration.migrateInstruction1.message: Migrating from Mapeo5 to MapeoSuperS will add additional security features including encryption

views.migration.migrateInstruction2.message: If you already have peers to synchronize Mapeo with, it is important that you are all ready to update together. You will not be able to synchronize your new Mapeo data with a device that has old Mapeo

views.migration.migrateInstruction3.message: MapeoSuperS introduces a new way to manage data security with your peers through Projects

views.migration.migrateInstruction4.message: Only one device in your Mapeo peer group can migrate the data to new Mapeo. It is recommended that before migration begins, all peers synchronize with old Mapeo. This selected device can migrate more data later if needed

views.migration.migrateInstruction5.message: Once you have synchronized with all or most devices in your old Mapeo project you are ready to Migrate data. It is easy. Let new Mapeo do the work for you by clicking Migrate

views.migration.migrateInstruction6.message: If another device has been designated as the migration device you need to skip migration. You will start with an empty database. You will need to be invited by the migration device to the new enhanced project in new Mapeo and sync to get prior Mapeo data back on your device

views.migration.migrateInstruction7.message: Have you decided you want a fresh start? You can skip migration. You can always migrate your data later

views.migration.migratePreviousInstructi.message: We have found a previous Mapeo project. To begin using MapeoSuperS with the data you have on Mapeo 5, data migration is required. Once you are ready to migrate your data to MapeoSuperS, follow the steps below.

views.migrationComplete.enterProjectName.message: Enter a name for your Project

views.migrationComplete.importedConfigCa.message: You will be able to update the config after you migrate.

views.migrationComplete.noNameErrorMessa.message: Please enter a name for your project

views.migrationNoData.calloutText.message: Your previous Mapeo data will not be visible in the new Mapeo applications until you migrate your data. To start, sync the data on your mobile device with the previous version of Mapeo.

views.migrationNoData.message.message: We are excited for you to experience the updated Mapeo.

views.migrationNoData.message2.message: One quick question before you get started:

views.migrationNoData.question.message: Have you used a previous version of Mapeo?

views.migrationNoData.questionCaption.message: This could be an earlier version of Mapeo on deskop or mobile. Versions 5x and earlier.
